name: quantitatively

in a way that relates to numbers or amounts: The risks are qualitatively if not quantitatively the same. How do you quantitatively measure sensitivity? See
quantitative
More examplesFewer examplesThis is one of the first studies that quantitatively measured iron from the dust. Migration has become in the last two to three years a quantitively more important phenomenon.Housing must improve qualitatively, not just quantitively.Many transformations can't be measured quantitatively.
